hero.title: Trusted Project Cargo Partner
hero.subtitle: At Haixun, we excel in providing customized logistics solutions for project cargo, ensuring client deadlines and requirements are met with precision.
hero.description: With expertise in handling oversized and sensitive shipments, we have successfully served clients such as Caterpillar China, electric car exporters, and construction companies.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive logistics solutions tailored to your needs

lcl.title: LCL Services
lcl.description: HAIXUN operates its own consolidation services on multiple trade routes.
lcl.heroTagline: Flexible Less-Than-Container Load solutions tailored for your partial shipments.
lcl.content1: Haixun Global provides Less-Than-Container Load (LCL) services designed for customers who do not have enough cargo to fill a full container but require reliable shipping.
lcl.content2: Our extensive global consolidation network helps customers move smaller shipments more economically by combining multiple consignments into one container.
lcl.content3: Our operations team manages receiving, stuffing, documentation, and delivery at destination, ensuring safety, transparency, and efficiency.
lcl.content4: With predictable transit schedules, frequent departures, and transparent pricing, our LCL solutions provide unmatched flexibility for businesses of all sizes.

cfs.title: CFS Services
cfs.description: Container Freight Station services providing efficient cargo handling.

fcl.title: FCL Services
fcl.description: HAIXUN owns a fleet of containers, including special equipment.
fcl.heroTagline: Full Container Load shipping solutions with dedicated containers.
fcl.content1: Full Container Load (FCL) shipping is ideal for businesses with enough cargo to fill an entire container.
fcl.content2: We provide dedicated containers ensuring your goods travel safely without sharing space with other shipments.
fcl.content3: Our FCL services offer competitive rates, reliable schedules, and door-to-door delivery options.
fcl.content4: With our extensive network of shipping lines, we ensure optimal routing and transit times for your cargo.

warehouse.title: Warehouse Management
warehouse.heroTagline: Modern warehousing solutions with advanced inventory management.
warehouse.content1: Our state-of-the-art warehousing facilities provide secure storage solutions for all types of cargo.
warehouse.content2: We offer comprehensive inventory management, pick-and-pack services, and distribution solutions.
warehouse.content3: Our warehouses are strategically located to optimize supply chain efficiency and reduce transit times.
warehouse.content4: Advanced security systems and climate-controlled environments ensure your goods remain in optimal condition.

projectCargo.title: Project Cargo
projectCargo.description: Specialized handling of oversized, heavy-lift, and complex project cargo.
projectCargo.heroTagline: Expert handling of oversized and complex project cargo.
projectCargo.content1: Project cargo requires specialized handling for oversized, heavy-lift, and complex shipments.
projectCargo.content2: Our experienced team manages every aspect from planning to execution, ensuring safe delivery.
projectCargo.content3: We provide customized solutions including route surveys, specialized equipment, and permits.
projectCargo.content4: Our track record includes successful delivery for construction, energy, and industrial sectors.

project.title: Project Logistics
project.description: Safe and timely handling of complex, large-scale project cargo.

air.title: Air Freight
air.description: Swift and reliable air cargo solutions connecting your business to global markets.
air.heroTagline: Fast and reliable air cargo solutions.
air.content1: HAIXUN can provide customized sea-air and air-sea options to meet customer deadlines while achieving significant cost savings.
air.content2: Through its efficient and globally connected network, HAIXUN handles airfreight consolidation across major world routesâ€”ensuring reliable schedules, competitive pricing, and seamless cargo movement.

oceanFreight.title: Ocean Freight
oceanFreight.description: Cost-effective sea cargo services with FCL and LCL options.

customs.title: Customs Clearance
customs.description: Smooth and efficient completion of all customs formalities.
customs.content1: Our customs clearance services ensure smooth and compliant import/export processes.
customs.content2: Our licensed customs brokers handle all documentation and regulatory requirements.
customs.content3: We provide duty optimization strategies and tariff classification guidance.
customs.content4: Our expertise covers all types of goods including hazardous materials and restricted items.

oog.title: OOG Shipments
oog.description: Cargo loading, lashing, survey arrangements for out-of-gauge cargo.
oog.content1: Out-of-gauge (OOG) cargo requires specialized equipment and handling expertise.
oog.content2: We arrange flat racks, open tops, and specialized containers for oversized cargo.
oog.content3: Our team handles lashing, securing, and all necessary documentation.
oog.content4: We coordinate with shipping lines and port authorities for smooth OOG operations.

import.title: Import Services
import.content1: Our comprehensive import services cover the entire process from origin to destination.
import.content2: We handle customs clearance, duty payments, and last-mile delivery.
import.content3: Our team provides guidance on import regulations and compliance requirements.
import.content4: We offer bonded warehousing and deferred duty payment options.

consolidation.title: Cargo Consolidation
consolidation.description: Direct export consolidations to key destinations.
consolidation.content1: Our consolidation services combine multiple shipments for cost-effective transportation.
consolidation.content2: We operate regular consolidation services to major global destinations.
consolidation.content3: Reduce your shipping costs while maintaining reliable delivery schedules.
consolidation.content4: Our consolidation network covers Asia, Europe, Americas, and beyond.

liquidCargo.title: Liquid Cargo Transportation
liquidCargo.description: Specialized transportation solutions for liquid cargo.

about.title: About Haixun Global
about.subtitle: 30+ Years of Logistics Excellence
about.paragraph1: Haixun Global Shenzhen, leverages over 30 years of expertise in logistics.
about.paragraph2: Established in 2019, Haixun Global Shenzhen upholds the Group's commitment to integrity.
about.paragraph3: Our services include tailored shipping plans with appropriate transport modes.
about.fastDeliveryDesc: Our vast global network ensures your cargo reaches destinations on schedule.
about.safeDeliveryDesc: From pickup to final drop-off, we maintain strict safety standards.

advantages.title: Our Advantages
advantages.subtitle: Delivering excellence through capacity, service, and expertise

transportation.title: Transportation Capacity
transportation.description: Engaged in cargo transportation services all over the country.

logistics.title: Logistics Service
logistics.description: Advanced information system with full process visibility.

team.title: Team Personnel
team.description: Highly competitive operation team with years of experience.
